constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA Name: Fairfield/Knights Park Conservation Area
SMKCON Name: Borough Wide Smoke Control Order

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate that the removal of the obligation of the legal agreement that prohibits residents and their visitors to apply and obtain on street parking permits would not result in increased parking pressures on the local highway network to the detriment of the local amenity and prejudice highway safety and as such the proposal would not be in accordance with paragraph 116 of the NPPF 2024, Policy 6.1 of the London Plan and Policies DM9 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.Moreover, the site is in a highly sustainable location, and to remove the legal agreement restriction would remove the incentive to encourage the use of sustainable and / or active transport modes contrary to policies of the London Plan, the LDF Core Strategy, and the NPPF>
description: Deed of Variation to Legal Agreement dated 18th January 2007 relating to planning permission 06/12671/FUL (Use as 3 flats comprising 2 x 2 bedroom and 1 x studio flat) to remove S106 unilateral planning obligation.
